short_summary: Agricultural drone with Lidar and multispectral camera capability
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by (April 09, 2024) at (14:00) EST. All bids submitted after (14:00) EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. (Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) has a requirement for one (1) Unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) + Lidar + Multispectral package. The Contractor must supply and deliver the package to Lethbridge, AB.)
full_summary:
=====================

### Request for Proposal: Unmanned Aerial Vehicle System

#### Tender Details

* **Bid Reference**: WS4411264726
* **Publication Date**: March 19, 2024
* **Closing Date**: April 9, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 25, 2024

#### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Goods or Services

The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) requires the purchase of an Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) system, including a Lidar sensor and a multispectral camera, to be delivered to Lethbridge, Alberta.

#### Contractor Requirements

* The contractor must provide and deliver the complete UAV system package.
* All bid submissions must be received by April 9, 2024, at 14:00 EST. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.
* The bid must include all required supporting documentation.

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Jared Popp
* **Contact Email**: [jared.popp@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jared.popp@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: (Not provided)

#### Tender Documents

The tender documents are available for download through the Ariba Discovery website.

#### Note

Please disregard the original closing time posted on Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys. All bid submissions must be received by the revised closing date and time. IBSgANElPA sentence.
